example.text: As Joe Biden higlighted corruption in Romania, a Romanian national was funneling millions to his family. All roads lead to Joe.

One member who voted against Kevin McCarthy said they did not care whether Democrat Hakeem Jefferies became Speaker of the House. ?My constituents have weathered enough of inflation, the border crisis, COVID lies, and threats to their constitutional rights- they deserve representation with enough backbone to work with a team to bring commonsense back to Congress.
